name: Totem Nights
description:
Every night the totems rise up to touch the sky. Help the little totem leader to gather his companions so that they can build higher totems and defeat the evil fire spirits. Of course there is strength in numbers! (oh! It is the jam theme!). Every enemy has power points (look at his eyes), so if a totem formed by an equal or greater number of pieces falls on the enemy it will eliminate it without suffering damage (except for invincible red spirits).

This game has been developed in one (very long) week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1. All programming, design and artwork has been done by Picodaddy (Me :D) except for the sounds (thanks buddy) and some assets like terrain tilesets, background parallax layers and music (sources coming soon, now I have to sleep).

Special thanks:

And thank you too! I would appreciate any kind of honest feedback to keep improving.
